professionalSummary: Shopify Developer with 3.5+ years of specialized experience in e-commerce solutions. Expert in theme development, customization, and optimization with proven success in delivering 15+ high-performance Shopify stores. Strong track record of implementing complex integrations and achieving significant improvements in conversion rates through technical optimizations and modern development practices. Demonstrated expertise in migrating legacy themes to Shopify 2.0 and implementing comprehensive e-commerce solutions.

responsibilities: Led development and optimization of 8+ Shopify stores, achieving 40% improvement in performance metrics
Successfully migrated multiple legacy themes to Shopify 2.0, implementing modern development practices
Integrated complex third-party applications and payment gateways (Razorpay, AmdOne)
Enhanced SEO optimization resulting in 30% increase in organic traffic
